summary: REAR SEAT LATCHES FAILED WHEN THE VEHICLE BRAKES. SEATS WILL UNLATCH WHEN THE VEHICLE BRAKES, RENDERING THE BACK SEAT UNABLE TO BE USED FOR SAFETY CONCERNS. EDMUNDS.COM INCLUDED A COMMENT ABOUT THE REAR SEAT LATCH FAILING IN THEIR REVIEW OF THE MAZDA CX-5 2013.  MAZDA SERVICE HAS INCLUDED THEIR NEED FOR REPLACEMENT ON THE ATTACHED INVOICE. I HAVE NOT REPAIRED THE LATCHES YET BECAUSE I BELIEVE THEY ARE A DEFECTIVE DEVICE AND I DO NOT WANT THEM REPLACED WITH A PART THAT MAY FAIL WHEN A PASSENGER IS RIDING IN THE REAR SEAT.
